tool_description: Validates and provides positioning guidelines for veterinary patients based on species, body part, and radiographic view requirements.

species.description: Animal species (dog, cat, bird, rabbit, etc.)

body_part.description: Target anatomical region (thorax, abdomen, limb, skull, spine)

error_messages: Unsupported species: Species must be one of the supported veterinary species.
Invalid body part: Body part must be a recognized anatomical region.
Invalid view type: View type must be a standard radiographic projection.
Invalid weight: Patient weight must be a positive number.
Positioning contraindication: This positioning may be unsafe for the patient condition.
usage: Specify species, body_part, view_type, and patient_weight. Optionally indicate sedation_status. The tool returns detailed positioning instructions and safety considerations.
